Oharter by Robert L, ang of Scots, whereby for the weal of his soul and of the souls of his ancestors and successors kings of Scotland, he grants to the Friars Preachers of Ayr the right of grinding their grain, of whatever sort necessary for food, at his mills of Ayr, free of multure: and that they

shall be nearer to the king in the mill than any others. Dated at Inche- michell, 21st February 1328.
